S.FORM: == satangahan == u zuma a sulit sipilatlat musaungay u zuma a kamu nu Hulam a kamu:運動,活動 nu Amilika a kamu:Sports, activities
== satangahan == o zoma a solit sipilatlat mosaongay o zoma a kamo no Holam a kamo:運動,活動 no Amilika a kamo:Sports, activities
